mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eleme_reminder_message(eleme_order_id, order_id, shop_id, reminder_id, user_id, update_time, tenant_id, branch_id, create_user_id, last_update_user_id, last_update_remark) VALUES(#{elemeOrderId}, #{orderId}, #{shopId}, #{reminderId}, #{userId}, #{updateTime}, #{tenantId}, #{branchId}, #{createUserId}, #{lastUpdateUserId}, #{lastUpdateRemark})
mapper.update: UPDATE eleme_reminder_message SET eleme_order_id = #{elemeOrderId}, order_id = #{orderId}, shop_id = #{shopId}, reminder_id = #{reminderId}, user_id = #{userId}, update_time = #{updateTime}, tenant_id = #{tenantId}, branch_id = #{branchId}, create_user_id = #{createUserId}, last_update_user_id = #{lastUpdateUserId}, last_update_remark = #{lastUpdateRemark}, deleted = #{deleted} WHERE id = #{id}
